Lines.string: gui.SS_Form1..caption("Sales Analysis by Product Line, Part Number with Cost")
'These are the options that set how many decimals will be used for the Cost and Quantity fields
'This is setting the RunId and identifying the report Id
'This is setting up the parameters for the CallWrapper

F.Intrinsic.String.Build("Select RUNID as BIRUNID, Part, Part_Locn, Cust, Invc_no, Invc_Date, Descr, Prod_Line, Qty_Shipped, Cost,(select sum(PARTIAL_MATERIAL*-1) as ACT_Mat from v_job_header b where a.order_num = b.sales_order and left(a.order_line,3) = b.sales_order_line group by sales_order,Sales_order_line),(select sum(PARTIAL_LABOR*-1) as ACT_Lab from v_job_header b where a.order_num = b.sales_order and left(a.order_line,3) = b.sales_order_line group by sales_order,Sales_order_line),(select sum(PARTIAL_OVERHEAD*-1) as ACT_Ovh from v_job_header b where a.order_num = b.sales_order and left(a.order_line,3) = b.sales_order_line group by sales_order,Sales_order_line),(select sum(PARTIAL_OTHER*-1) as ACT_Oth from v_job_header b where a.order_num = b.sales_order and left(a.order_line,3) = b.sales_order_line group by sales_order,Sales_order_line),(select sum(PARTIAL_OUTSIDE*-1) as ACT_Out from v_job_header b where a.order_num = b.sales_order and left(a.order_line,3) = b.sales_order_line group by sales_order,Sales_order_line),(select sum(PARTIAL_FREIGHT*-1) as ACT_Frt from v_job_header b where a.order_num = b.sales_order and left(a.order_line,3) = b.sales_order_line group by sales_order,Sales_order_line), Sales, ShipTo_ID, Ship_Name, Salesman_ID AS Sales_Rep, Salesman_Name as Sales_Rep_Name, Order_Num, Branch, Order_Seq, Freight_flag, Prog_bill_flag as Progress_Flag, excl_acct_flag, Matl, Labor, Ovhd, Outs, Frgt, Oth from Y_SA_IN_DETAIL a where RUNID = '{0}'",V.Global.iBIRunID,V.Local.ssql)
SS_Form1{{CAPTION::Sales Analysis by Product Line, Part Number with Cost
